Description:
Kizumonogatari Part 1: Tekketsu Original Soundtrack (「傷物語」劇伴音楽集 其ノ壹 鉄血篇, "Kizumonogatari" Gekiban Ongakushuu Sono Ichi Tekketsu Hen) is the film soundtrack album for the first film in the trilogy.
There are two editions of the soundtrack, one format on CD (Standard Edition) and another on Vinyl (Limited Edition) released in Japan on July 27, 2016.[1][2] Only the Standard Edition was released in North America on December 27, 2016 alongside the Blu-ray.[3] The Limited Edition is exclusive to Japan. 
It is composed by Satoru Kosaki,  Ryuichi Takada, Keigo Hoashi, and Ken Namba.
